item.title: Traveling to Photograph: Rewards and Pitfalls
item.description: PLEASE JOIN LIVE ZOOM: Saturday May 2nd, 7pm Eastern. The history of photography is full of great examples of photographers that left the comfort of home to seek out the wider world with their camera tucked under their arm.

item.title: Shooting Film in the Digital Age???
item.description: Recording from April 25th: This week’s topic, which I promise will not just be a pedantic drubbing of film or digital, but an exploration of reasons why an artist-photographer might choose one over the other (or both, is it possible to be agnostic?

item.title: Domestic Focus: The Photographer at Home
item.description: Recording from April 18th: This week’s topic is plucked straight from the zeitgeist, and a popular subject among curators and museums right now in this time of sheltering-at-home.

item.title: Camera as Instrument: Machine to Photographer Feedback
item.description: Recording from April 11th: This week’s topic explores the relationship between the photographer and the cameras they choose to employ.

item.title: Joseph Sudek's Praha Panoramatická
item.description: Recording from April 4th: The topic is the great 1959 book of panoramic photographs by the Czech photographer Josef Sudek, “Praha Panoramatická”.

item.title: Kai McBride
item.description: In April 2020 Kai McBride started hosting Kai’s Photo Topic: a weekly(?
